headline.main: Naples Line Abruptly Melted, Pouring Allies Onto the Plain; Naples Line Melted, Pouring Allies Onto Plain

lead_paragraph: WITH THE FIFTH ARMY IN ITALY, Sept. 28 (Delayed) -- We have beaten the Germans back from the passes north of Salerno. We are far out onto the Neapolitan plain, so far out that only a few hours ago I crouched in a doorway on the edge of Scafati while a German Mark III fired directly into us from only 600 yards ahead on a straight highway.
